English: Zhang Xun (1854-1923), Qing loyalist general who attempted to restore the abdicated emperor Puyi `溥儀~|`溥~仪[Pu3 yi2] to the throne in the Manchu Restoration of 1917 `張勳~`復辟~|张勋`复~`辟~[Zhanɡ1 Xun1 Fu4 bi4]

Zhang Xun (1854-1923), Qing loyalist general who attempted to restore the abdicated emperor Puyi `溥儀~|`溥~仪[Pu3 yi2] to the throne in the Manchu Restoration of 1917 `張勳~`復辟~|张勋`复~`辟~[Zhanɡ1 Xun1 Fu4 bi4]
